Texts.Eng: Let's build a ^orange;Hydroponics Tray^reset; next. You can build it in the ^orange;Power Station^reset; and use it to ^green;quickly grow plants^reset;.
Set up the lab next. Then, put some ^orange;Water^reset;, a ^green;seed^reset; and a ^green;fertilizer^reset; in the ^orange;Hydroponics Tray^reset; and wait a while for ^green;useful produce^reset;.
